title: My login Username was already taken when I had to rechoose it.
body: Why. I've been using the same login name since 2013. I miss one day and suddenly it's gone forever. This has happened to my friend as well. I just want my OG name that I came up with when I was a kid. Please man.

replies.body: Same this is what happened to me and the worst part is that Riot hasn't done anything about it for days.
See my response to OP. If your UN is reasonably unique, chances are you have an account on another region (incl. PBE) that shares the same UN.

Riot accounts are global where LoL accounts are regional. If you have another LoL account on another region with the same UN, it will conflict. If you want to keep your original Un for OCE, you have to use the update link to login to those other regions (this includes PBE) and update those UNs to something else first.

Depending on how common your UN is, there will naturally still be some conflicts, but for the most part, people are seeing this message (at least ofhte ones posting about it) because they have accounts on other regions that share a UN.
